ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] the dangers of digest mode!
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow Tork, I agree with a lot of your stuff here!  I have to disagree with the Kunark Loot part though.  I think they fixed the yard trash drops thankfully, and
ygData.messageBody:
Wow Tork, I agree with a lot of your stuff here! I have to disagree with
the Kunark Loot part though. I think they fixed the yard trash drops
thankfully, and some of the stuff is pretty over the top, but don't get me
started on No Drop. I hate No Drop so much I could puke. If all the good
stuff was No Drop I could flush all my plat down the toilet right now cause
there would be nothing to spend it on. Lets keep No Drop for quest items
and I think it will all work out.

Kitasi

On Kurnark Loot:
I HATE it not being NODROP most of all, but also I HATE soloable yard trash
at the zone line dropping stuff better than stuff my guild spend MONTHS
/played in planes for and I HATE the Monty Haul stats. I had a really long
rant typed out but in the end I deleted because there's no need to subject
you all to it. =)

Have fun all and sorry for the novel!
-Tork@Nameless
